item.description:
John Carpenter's Suburban Screams
Season 1

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Poster | Key Art

Documentary • 1 Season • TVMA • AD

Series Description
Say Hello to Peacock! The wildly entertaining new streaming service for watching John Carpenter's Suburban Screams. Watch today!

Season Description
John Carpenter unearths the evil that lurks in the suburbs, showcasing true stories of real-life slashers, psychos, hauntings and possessions.
